name: Pixel Perfect (North Point Games)
description:
All the pixels have assembled to form the title screen but one is out of place!  This is unacceptable!  Help it get to the proper spot!

Controls

A/D - Move

W - Jump

ESC - Pause

A Game By

Phil Crawford

Music By

Matthew Pablo

Testers

James Bollivar     Alex Crawford

Dan Nalesnik     Susan Sze

Mike Taylor     John Tritsch
